backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a dictionary service with functions to add words with definitions, retrieve words, list all words, and get definitions; includes blob storage mixin and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old actor state (users, sessions, artworks, music, games) and new actor state (wordMap), with a run function that initializes an empty word map for the dictionary feature.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: Dictionary navigation tab, dictionary search interface, and AI text-to-speech for word pronunciation, all with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including App.tsx with Dictionary tab, DictionaryView component, hooks for dictionary search and text-to-speech, and various other AI features like math solver, media generation, translation, music, art, code, and games.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with black/dark backgrounds and educational color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with comprehensive SEO meta tags, Open Graph tags, Twitter Card tags, canonical URL, JSON-LD structured data for WebApplication schema, and PWA manifest link for Nexora AI platform.
frontend/public/demo.html: Standalone interactive demo page with dark theme styling, header navigation with tab buttons, and card-based layout for showcasing Neroxa AI features.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining Neroxa AI app metadata including name, description, icons, theme colors, and standalone display mode.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt file allowing all user agents to crawl all pages.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing all main application routes (home, chat, math, media, translation, music, art, code, games) with priorities and update frequencies for SEO.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that handles routing, authentication via Internet Identity, and renders different feature tabs (chat, math solver, translator, music, art, games, dictionary) with a sidebar and header.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Interactive drawing canvas component with color palette, brush size controls, eraser tool, AI art idea generator chat, and functionality to save/share artwork with shareable URLs.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar that displays chat session history with timestamps, allows creating new chat sessions, and handles session selection with loading states.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Chat interface component that displays messages between user and AI assistant, handles message sending with textarea input, and auto-scrolls to latest messages.
frontend/src/components/DictionaryView.t: Dictionary lookup component with search input, displays word definitions and pronunciations, integrates text-to-speech for pronunciation, and handles error states for words not found.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Card component for displaying game catalogue entries with thumbnail, title, description, category badge, and play button with hover effects.
frontend/src/components/GamePlayer.tsx: A modal dialog component that displays game metadata and provides a fullscreen-capable player interface with header controls and placeholder content for game rendering.
frontend/src/components/GamesView.tsx: A paginated game catalogue view with search and category filtering, displaying game cards in a grid and launching the GamePlayer modal when a game is selected.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header component with logo, theme toggle (light/dark), and conditional sign-out button for authenticated Internet Identity users.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: A math problem solver with difficulty levels, teacher mode, and homework helper mode that evaluates expressions client-side and generates step-by-step solutions with concept explanations.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: A tabbed interface for AI-powered image and video generation using text prompts, with upload progress tracking and display of generated media in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: A music creation component supporting both AI-generated audio from text prompts and a beat pattern sequencer with playback controls, tempo adjustment, and music sharing functionality.
frontend/src/components/Scripter.tsx: React component for a script/code generator chat interface with syntax highlighting, copy-to-clipboard functionality, and real-time code generation using the useScriptGeneration hook.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: Component that displays shared artwork or music content by ID, fetching from backend via useSharedArtwork/useSharedMusic hooks with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: Translation chat interface with language selection dropdowns (10 languages), translation history display, and uses the useTranslation hook for text translation between languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the Internet Computer actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Hook that generates art prompt suggestions based on user input keywords (animals, landscapes, abstract, portraits, fantasy, space, flowers, food) with predefined idea templates for each category.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: Hook for sharing artwork by generating unique IDs and share URLs; backend sharing is disabled but local ID generation and clipboard copy functionality remain.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Hook that generates synthetic audio using Web Audio API, creating simple melodies based on prompt text and converting AudioBuffer to WAV blobs for playback and download.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Custom React hook that manages canvas drawing state and operations including mouse/touch drawing, erasing, brush size/color control, and canvas clearing with white background initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: React hook for managing chat sessions using React Query, now returns empty data as backend no longer supports session persistence; provides local-only session creation and message handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useDictionarySearch.t: React Query hook that fetches word definitions from the backend actor with case-insensitive search, infinite stale time, and no retries on failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameCatalogue.ts: React Query hooks for fetching game catalogue and metadata, now returns empty/mock data as backend no longer supports game functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY AuthClient, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Custom hook that simulates AI image and video generation by creating placeholder canvas-based media with gradient backgrounds and text overlays, managing generation state and history.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: React Query mutation hook for sharing music that generates local-only music IDs and provides URL copying functionality; backend persistence is no longer supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useScriptGeneration.t: Custom hook that simulates AI script generation with conversation history, generating mock code snippets (React, Python, JavaScript, API calls, etc.) based on user request keywords.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: React Query hooks for fetching shared artwork and music content that now throw errors as backend no longer supports content retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Custom hook that wraps the Web Speech API for text-to-speech functionality with browser support detection, speech state management, and configurable voice parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Custom React hook that manages translation state and provides mock translation functionality with simulated API delays, supporting 12 languages with basic greeting and thank-you phrase translations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens defining a dark theme with teal primary colors, coral accents, and OKLCH color space values for consistent styling across the application.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility module exporting a `cn` function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name composition.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking existing features (dictionary section, search interface, AI text-to-speech) and pending feature requests for a 250k+ word database, with known deployment issues.
